ComicInfo.Summary:
A sequel to the acclaimed Full Moon space western that introduced the world to "cowboys and aliens!" Zach Stone and his intrepid crew must guide the cursed daughter of Red Eye across the Badlands! If the Skorps don't get them, bounty hunter Skruk Morgus just might!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Romina Moranelli (a) & Marcelo Costa (c) | 1 | B | Variant Sketch Cover, Limited to 1500 | Romina Moranelli | 2 | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Ryan Browne | 3 | D | Photo Cover, Limited to 1500 | Photo | 4 | E | Poster Cover, Limited to 1500 | Movie Poster | 5 | F | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Andrew Magnum | 6 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-28 21:10:55. [CVDB544777]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andrew Magnum, Marcelo Costa, Romina Moranelli, Ryan Browne
ComicInfo.Characters: Marshall Zack Stone, Skruk Morgus, Stell Barr
